name: Tandoori Shrimp Tikka with Cilantro Chutney
recipeIngredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
recipeInstructions: In a large bowl, whisk together yogurt, lemon juice, ghee or oil, tandoori masala, garam masala, cumin powder, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper.
Add the shrimp to the marinade and mix well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
Remove the shrimp from the marinade and thread onto skewers. Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, mix together cilantro leaves, green chutney (see note), and 1 tablespoon lemon juice in a bowl.
To serve, place toasted naan breads on a platter, top with tandoori shrimp, cilantro chutney, and any additional garnishes desired.
description: A flavorful and aromatic appetizer or snack that showcases the rich flavors of Indian cuisine.
image: Tandoori Shrimp Tikka with Cilantro Chutney
